member.name: M:PoohAPI.Controllers.VacaturesController.GetAll(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of all vacatures
member.param: The max amount of vacatures to return, defaults to 5

member.name: M:PoohAPI.Controllers.VacaturesController.GetAllBasic(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of all basic vacatures
member.returns: A list of all basic vacatures
member.param: The max amount of vacatures to return, defaults to 5
member.response: Returns the list of basic vacatures
If no basic vacatures are found

member.name: M:PoohAPI.Controllers.VacaturesController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a specific vacature by Id
member.param: The Id of the vacature to retrieve
member.response: If the specified vacature was not found

member.name: M:PoohAPI.Controllers.VacaturesController.LikeVacature
member.summary: Adds the specified vacature to the liked vacatures of the current user.
member.response: If the request was a success
If the specified vacature was not found
